tasks.task: Farmer plants crops in the field
subtasks: Driving combine harvester to transport to field
Exiting combine harvester
Walking to the field with planting equipment
Planting crops in the field
Returning to combine harvester

tasks.task: Farmer operates combine harvester
subtasks: Boarding combine harvester
Starting combine harvester
Driving combine harvester into the field
Operating combine harvester to harvest crops
Directing harvested crops into bin
Unloading harvested crops from combine harvester

tasks.task: Farmer sets up irrigation system
subtasks: Walking to the irrigation field
Adjusting sprinkler heads for optimal coverage
Connecting irrigation hoses and pipes
Turning on water supply
Monitoring water distribution across the field

tasks.task: Farmer applies chemical treatments
subtasks: Walking to the chemical application area
Loading pesticide or fertilizer onto sprayer
Connecting sprayer hoses and nozzles
Calibration sprayer for proper application rate
Wearing protective clothing and safety gear
Driving or pushing sprayer through crop rows
Applying chemicals evenly across the field

tasks.task: Repairing tractor
subtasks: Removing faulty parts from tractor
Inspecting issue with the tractor
Welding or soldering repair parts
Testing the repaired tractor in a safe area

tasks.task: Farmer applies manure to field
subtasks: Loading tractor with manure spreader
Driving to the field with manure spreader
Activating manure spreader
Distributing manure evenly across the field

tasks.task: Filling water tank on combine harvester
subtasks: Walking to the combine harvester
Lowering water tank access panel
Refilling water tank with clean water
Securing water tank cover

tasks.task: Attaching a tool bar to the tractor
subtasks: Unloading tool bar from storage
Aligning tool bar with tractor hitch points
Securing tool bar to tractor using pins or plates
Testing attachment for proper connection

tasks.task: Operator operating forklift
subtasks: Entering forklift cab
Maneuvering forklift to load and unload equipment
Safely raising and lowering forks to load/unload
Offset: directing traffic or other equipment around the forklift

tasks.task: Adjusting spray nozzle on sprayer
subtasks: Closing down chemical application for the day
Walking to the sprayer
Opening sprayer tank
Changing spray nozzles for different chemicals or rates
Reconnecting and securing new nozzles

tasks.task: Farmer checks on livestock
subtasks: Walking to the livestock pen
Observing animal behavior and health
Patting animals to comfort or check suitability
Feeding animals
Watering animals

tasks.task: Driving a pickup truck
subtasks: Entering the driver's seat of the pickup truck
Securing livestock or crop items in the bed
Starting the truck and driving to a location
Offset: navigating through fields or over rough terrain

tasks.task: Farmer operates tiller attachment on tractor
subtasks: Attaching tiller to tractor
Positioning the tractor over the desired area
Starting the tiller and operating depth adjustment
Driving the tractor slowly to till the soil

tasks.task: Farmer installs weather station
subtasks: Walking to the desired location with weather station equipment
Setting up installation poles or mounts
Assembling weather station components
Connecting sensors and uploading data to monitoring system

tasks.task: Farmer uses hay baler
subtasks: Walking to the field with hay to be baled
Ensuring hay is properly stacked before baling
Operating the hay baler to gather and compress hay into bales
Securing bales or moving them to storage

tasks.task: Inspecting water pump on irrigation system
subtasks: Walking to the irrigation pump house
Disconnecting the pump to assess the issue
Checking for visible damage or leaks
Possibly replacing worn-out parts
Reassembling and testing the pump

tasks.task: Installing tree guards on young saplings
subtasks: Walking to the planted saplings
Measuring and cutting tree guard tubes to size
Slipping guards over saplings
Protecting tree trunks from browsing animals

tasks.task: Cleaning pruning shears used in orchard
subtasks: Walking to the orchard with pruning tools
Removing debris from shears
Wiping blades with a cleaner
Disinfecting blades to prevent disease spread

tasks.task: Using a skid steer to spread lime
subtasks: Unloading lime onto skid steer
Driving skid steer to the field
Engaging appropriate attachments for spreading
Spreading lime uniformly across the field

tasks.task: Farmer calibrates sprayer for proper application
subtasks: Reading the sprayer manual or a calibration chart
Measuring distance between nozzle tips using calibration rods
Measuring the volume of fluid sprayed over that distance
Adjusting the flow rate or nozzle spacing to meet the required rate
Repeating the test and making further adjustments if necessary

tasks.task: Loading manure onto a spreader trailer
subtasks: Walk to the manure pile or storage area
Loading a spreader trailer with manure using a loader or front end loader
Ensuring the manure is evenly distributed in the trailer

tasks.task: Performing routine tractor maintenance checks
subtasks: Walking around the tractor to check for any visible damage
Checking oil and coolant levels
Inspecting tires for proper inflation and signs of wear
Tightening loose bolts or nuts on the tractor

tasks.task: Farmer builds a containment fence around a field
subtasks: Gathering fence materials, tools, and stakes
Clearing the area where the fence will be built
Staking out the fence line with posts at regular intervals
Cutting wire or fence panels to size
Assembling the fence by connecting the posts and panels

tasks.task: Packing snow around tree trunks
subtasks: Walking through the orchard in winter
Gathering snow from nearby areas
Shoveling or collecting snow and piling it around the trunks of young trees
Protecting trunks from freezing and livestock damage

tasks.task: Checking dairy cows for signs of illness
subtasks: Observing the herd in the milking parlor or pasture
Checking vital signs such as temperature, respiration, and alertness
Inspecting udders for swelling, redness, or lesions
Documenting any abnormalities or symptoms

tasks.task: Applying uniform pressure with a leveling tool
subtasks: Walking across the field with a grading or leveling tool attached to a tractor
Using the tool to smooth out ruts or uneven areas
Ensuring correct grade and drainage by monitoring water movement.

tasks.task: Farmer attaches a stake to mark property boundaries
subtasks: Walking along a boundary where markers are needed
Determining the correct spacing between stakes
Driving stakes into the ground and attaching markers or flags.

tasks.task: Checking irrigation lines for leaks or blockages
subtasks: Walking or driving around the field checking irrigation lines
Using a soapy solution to test for leaks
Locating and pin-pointing areas where pressure drop is felt or foam is present
Repairing identified leaks by patching or re-sealing joints
Ensuring that all components are properly connected and tightened.

tasks.task: Preparing a new field for planting
subtasks: Mowing the field to remove weeds or frosted vegetation
Conducting soil tests to assess fertility and pH levels
Applying recommended amendments such as lime or fertilizer
Tilling the land to a suitable depth for planting.

tasks.task: Using a disc harrow to roughen the soil surface
subtasks: Attaching the disc harrow to the tractor
Operating the hydraulics to lower the discs into the field
Driving the tractor at a consistent speed to break up clumps and crush any larger aggregates.

tasks.task: Starting a chemical tank through agitation
subtasks: Ensuring the chemical mixing tanks are empty or partially filled
Attaching the agitation device such as a propeller or paddles
Starting the agitation motor to stir the chemicals into solution.

tasks.task: Attaching a hydraulic lift on a forklift
subtasks: Closing the forklift compartment if necessary
Elevating the forks to a safe height
Aligning the lift with the equipment or product to be moved

tasks.task: Planting winter cover crops
subtasks: Preparing seedbed by plowing or disking the field
Broadcasting or drilling cover crop seeds into the soil
Covering the seeds with soil or straw mulch to retain moisture
Installing supplemental irrigation if needed.

tasks.task: Cleaning shears after use
subtasks: Disassembling the pruning tool into its components
